Logger

public protocol Logger

A logger protocol implemented by Logger implementations. This API is used by Kitura throughout its implementation when logging.

  • log(_:msg:functionName:lineNum:fileName:)

    Output a logged message.

    Parameter

    Parameter type: The type of the message (LoggerMessageType) being logged.

    Parameter

    Parameter msg: The message to be logged

    Parameter

    Parameter functionName: The name of the function invoking the logger API.

    Parameter

    Parameter lineNum: The line in the source code of the function invoking the logger API.

    Parameter

    Parameter fileName: The file of the source code of the function invoking the logger API.

    Declaration

    Swift

    func log(_ type: LoggerMessageType, msg: String,

    Parameters

    type

    The type of the message (LoggerMessageType) being logged.
    msg

    The message to be logged
    functionName

    The name of the function invoking the logger API.
    lineNum

    The line in the source code of the function invoking the logger API.
    fileName

    The file of the source code of the function invoking the logger API.
  • isLogging(_:)

    A function that will indicate if a message with a specified type (LoggerMessageType) will be outputted in the log (i.e. will not be filtered out).

    -Parameter type: The type of message that one wants to know if it will be output in the log.

    Returns

    A Bool indicating whether, if true, or not a message of the specified type (LoggerMessageType) will be outputted.

    Declaration

    Swift

    func isLogging(_ level: LoggerMessageType) -> Bool

    Return Value

    A Bool indicating whether, if true, or not a message of the specified type (LoggerMessageType) will be outputted.
